title: Special.Transport.Simulator.2013-TiNYiSO
description:
-=- Proudly Presents -=-

Special Transport Simulator 2013 (c) Astragon Software

Release On   : 16 July 2013         Disk Amount/Format : 1 DVD ISO
Type of Game : Simulator            Media Protection   : Nothing

Do you find fascination in the skill and precision that is needed to steer
huge special transports through crooked city streets and down narrow lanes

Take on the challenge and transport heavy and unwieldy cargo safely and
quickly to its destination. You will drive along interstate roads, motorways
and narrow country roads and navigate through small towns and across unpaved
access roads. Many tricky and varied missions await you

The missions will give you the chance to get behind the wheel of different
trucks and their various trailers. You will be able to transport a diverse
range of heavy cargo such as construction machines, wind tower segments,
railway vehicles, industrial equipment and machine cabins. Not only will you
be able to move freely during the missions but they will also require you to
change between vehicles depending on the assigned tasks ? and time is always
of essence Day and night-circles as well as changing weather conditions such
as rain and fog will influence the difficulty of your job.

Features
5 vehicles (2 vans, 3 trucks)
Diverse trailer combinations
Freely accessible environment
Successful missions influence the appearance of the game world
Combined missions with change of vehicles
Change to first person perspective and exiting the vehicles is possible
Broad range of cargo from construction machines to industrial equipment

Burn/mount, install, play

Greetz: LARGEiSO and MEDIUMiSO

(C) E/dfs
" SIZE DOES NOT MATTER
